contentrichtext.text: {{WikiProject status|inactive|parent=Pakistan|type=geo}} The '''WikiProject Pakistani Districts''', this article provides a guideline to write articles about the [[Districts of Pakistan|Pakistan districts]] in the four provinces, namely, [[Sindh]], [[Punjab (Pakistan)|Punjab]], [[North West Frontier Province]] and [[Balochistan (Pakistan)|Balochistan]]. The idea of [[Wikipedia:WikiProject|WikiProject]] is to create articles on the [[Districts of Pakistan]], to improve accuracy and formatting of the articles. {{Refimprove|date=July 2009}} {{Infobox settlement | name = Chak 358/W.B | official_name = | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_map = Lodhran District.png | mapsize = 200px | map_alt = | map_caption = Map of [[Punjab (Pakistan)|Punjab]] with Lodhran District highlighted | latd = |latm = |lats = |latNS = | longd = |longm = |longs = |longEW = | coordinates_type = | coordinates_display = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Pakistan]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of Pakistan|Province]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Punjab (Pakistan)|Punjab]] | subdivision_type2 = Capital | subdivision_name2 = [[Lodhran|Lodhran city]] | area_total_km2 = 1790 | population_as_of = 2009 | population_total = 1464750 | population_density_km2 = 716}} ==Descendant WikiProjects== :No Descendant WikiProjects have been defined. ==Similar WikiProjects== Wikiprojects have used by many similar Wikiprojects, that include; * [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Indian districts]] * [[Wikipedia:WikiProject German districts]] * [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Vietnamese provinces]] * [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Thai provinces]] ==Participants== * Add your name to the list if you are able to work on many of the articles for the Pakistan districts to update them; ** [[User:Aalahazrat|Aalahazrat]] ** [[User:Green Giant|Green Giant]] ** [[User:Shakeelgilgity|Gilgity]] ** [[User:Zakksez|Zak]] ** [[User:Arunreginald|Arun Reginald]] ** [[User:Taimoors|Taimoors]] ** [[User:khalidkhoso|khalidkhoso]] ** [[User:rzafar|rzafar]] ** [[User:Teckgeek|Ali]] ** [[User:Pahari Sahib|Pahari Sahib]] ** [[User:MasoodAhmedBazmiMalikQadri|MasoodAhmedBazmiMalikQadri]] ** [[User:Just Feel It|Just Feel It]] ==Structure== The article should start with an introduction to the district, giving the name is English and Urdu and any or all other local languages of the district and the location of the district should also be indicated. * The fact sheet includes ** Capital City ** Population ** Area ** Density of Population ** Province ** A map of Pakistan with the district highlighted (Maps have not been created yet.) * The rest of the article should contain the following information ** History ** Geography ** Demographics ** Important locations ** Sites of Interest ** Miscellaneous ** External Links ==Naming conventions== *see also [[Wikipedia:Naming conventions (Indic)]] == See also == * [[Pakistan]] * [[Districts of Pakistan]] * [[Subdivisions of Pakistan]] * [[Geography of Pakistan]] * [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Subnational entities]] [[Category:Regional WikiProjects|P]] [[Category:Pakistan-related WikiProjects|D]] [[sr:Wisesabre]]
